brick_022.title: Altar Ritual – Elemental Release (Whispering Trees System)
phases: User approaches the sacred field where trees, fence, and water meet.
Element options appear: Whisper to Wind, Water, Trees, or Crows.
Each triggers a symbolic act of release. Visual: Tree_Hug, Tell_Crows, Tell_Water, Field.
Final screen: user chooses ‘Let it go’ or ‘Tell the Crows’ to lock ritual intent.
brick_022.note: Visual assets are finalized and locked across 4 series.
